lines.gurmukhi: 1 gurisK - ivkwrwN qoN pry hY ]
lines.transliteration_english: Ikonkaar Satigur Prasaadi ?

Shabad OS B.translation: One Oankar, the primal energy, realized through the grace of divine preceptor

lines.gurmukhi: kwm lK kir kwmnw bhu rUpI sohY
lines.transliteration_english: Kaam Lakh Kari Kaamanaa Bahu Roopee Sohai.

Shabad OS B.translation: Passionate urges in the form of lacs of desires may appear in many forms.

lines.gurmukhi: lK krop kroD kir dusmn huie johY
lines.transliteration_english: Lakh Karodh Karodh Kari Dousaman Hoi Johai.

Shabad OS B.translation: Lacs of enemies may stare in anger; temptations in lacs and lacs of mammons may inveigle and deceive;

lines.gurmukhi: lK loB lK lKmI huie Dohx DohY
lines.transliteration_english: Lakh Lobh Lakh Lakhamee Hoi Dhohan Dhohai.

Shabad OS B.translation: Maya and infatuation pretending to be virtuous may in crores of ways adorne(the world);

lines.gurmukhi: mwieAw moih kroV imil huie bhu gux sohY
lines.transliteration_english: Maaiaa Mohi Karorh Mili Ho Bahu Goun Sohai.

Shabad OS B.translation: And ego, full of pride for having killed lacs of demons, may touch a gursikh;

lines.gurmukhi: Asur sMGwir hMkwr lK haumY kir CohY
lines.transliteration_english: Asur Sanghaari Hankaar Lakh Haoumai Kari Chhohai.

Shabad OS B.translation: But to the Sikh of the Guru, who listens to the teachings of the Guru in the holy congregation,

lines.gurmukhi: swDsMgiq guru isK suix guru isK n pohY ]1]
lines.transliteration_english: Saadhasangati Guru Sikh Souni Guru Sikh N Pohai ?1?

Shabad OS B.translation: They all cannot affect the least.

lines.gurmukhi: 2 gurisK - kwmI nhIN

Shabad OS B.translation: Sexual urges do not touch the Sikh of the Guru -

lines.gurmukhi: lK kwmix lK kwmrUp lK kwmixAwrI
lines.transliteration_english: Lakh Kaamani Lakh Kaavaroo Lakh Kaamaniaaree.

Shabad OS B.translation: Lacs of magician women of lacs of kamaraps (a state in east India where women were supposed to be very beautiful);

lines.gurmukhi: sMgldIphuN pdmxI bhu rUip sIgwrI
lines.transliteration_english: Singal Deepahoun Padamanee Bahu Roopi Seegaaree.

Shabad OS B.translation: The best category of women (Padrnini) of Shilialdvi:p (modern Sri Lanka) adept in embellishments;

lines.gurmukhi: mohxIAwN ieMdRwpurI ApCrwN sucwrI
lines.transliteration_english: Mohaneeaan Indraa Puree Apachharaa Souchaaree.

Shabad OS B.translation: Chaste nymphs of Indralok (the abode of Indr, the Vedic god),

lines.gurmukhi: hUrwN prIAwN lK lK bihsq svwrI
lines.transliteration_english: Hooraan Pareeaan Lakh Lakh Lakh Bahisat Savaaree.

Shabad OS B.translation: Houris of paradise and fairies in lacs;

lines.gurmukhi: lK kaulwN nv jobnI lK kwm krwrI
lines.transliteration_english: Lakh Kaulaan Nav Jobanee Lakh Kaam Karaaree.

Shabad OS B.translation: Lacs of young girls adept in sexual arts also cannot touch

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuiK poih n sknI swDsMgiq BwrI ]2]
lines.transliteration_english: Guramoukhi Pohi N Sakanee Saadhasangati Bhaaree ?2?

Shabad OS B.translation: The gurmukh who resides in the grand holy congregation.

lines.gurmukhi: 3 gurisK - hMkwr dI mwroN pry hn

Shabad OS B.translation: The Sikh of Guru is beyond the sway of ego -

lines.gurmukhi: lK durXoDn kMs lK lK dYq lVMdy
lines.transliteration_english: Lakh Durayojan Kans Lakh Lakh Dait Larhanday.

Shabad OS B.translation: Lacs of Duryodhan, Kans and lacs of demons may be there who keep fighting;

lines.gurmukhi: lK rwvx kuMBkrx lK lK rwks mMdy
lines.transliteration_english: Lakh Raavan Kounbhakaran Lakh Lakh Raakas Manday.

Shabad OS B.translation: Lacs of Ravans, Kumbhakarans and other evil demons there may be;

lines.gurmukhi: prsrwm lK shNsbwhu kir KudI KhMdy
lines.transliteration_english: Parasaraam Lakh Sahasabaahu Kari Khudee Khahanday.

Shabad OS B.translation: Lacs of Padu Rams and Sahsrbahus may be wrangling in ego with one another;

lines.gurmukhi: hrnksp hrxwksw nrisMG bukMdy
lines.transliteration_english: Haranaakas Bahu Haranaakasaa Narasingh Boukanday.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many may be there like Hiranyakasipu and the roaring man-lion Narsinghs;

lines.gurmukhi: lK kroD ivroD lK lK vYru krMdy
lines.transliteration_english: Lakh Karodh Virodh Lakh Lakh Vairu Karanday.

Shabad OS B.translation: Lacs of angry people with lacs of antagonisms and lacs of enmities may be there.

lines.gurmukhi: guru isK poih n skeI swDsMig imlMdy ]3]
lines.transliteration_english: Guru Sikh Pohi N Sakaee Saadhasangi Miladay ?3?

Shabad OS B.translation: They all cannot put any harm to the Sikhs of the Guru who gather in the holy congregation.

lines.gurmukhi: 4 gurisK loBI nhIN

Shabad OS B.translation: The Sikh of the Guru does not fall a prey to greed

lines.gurmukhi: soienw rupw lK mxw lK Bry BMfwrw
lines.transliteration_english: Soinaa Roupaa Lakh Manaa Lakh Bharay Bhandaaraa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Lacs of mounds of gold and rupees and lacs of filled up store houses;

lines.gurmukhi: moqI mwixk hIirAwN bhu mol Apwrw
lines.transliteration_english: Motee Maanik Heeriaan Bahu Mol Apaaraa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Invaluable pearls, rubies and diamonds;

lines.gurmukhi: dys vys lK rwj Bwg prgxy hjwrw
lines.transliteration_english: Days Vays Lakh Raaj Bhaag Paraganay Hajaaraa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Lacs of kingdoms, countries and thousands of paraganas (districts);

lines.gurmukhi: irDI isDI jog Bog ABrx sIgwrw
lines.transliteration_english: Ridhee Sidhee Jog Bhog Abharan Seegaaraa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Riddhis, siddhis (miraculous powers), renunciations, enjoyments, ornaments. embellishments;

lines.gurmukhi: kwmDynu lK pwrjwiq icMqwmix pwrw
lines.transliteration_english: Kaamadhaynu Lakh Paarijaati Chintaamani Paaraa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Kantdhenus, the wishfulfilling cows, lacs of wishfulfilling trees (parijats) and fabulous gems;

lines.gurmukhi: cwr pdwrQ sgl Pl lK loB auBwrw
lines.transliteration_english: Chaar Padaarad Sagal Phal Lakh Lobh Loubhaaraa.

Shabad OS B.translation: All the four ideals of life (dhrma, arth, Kam and moks);

lines.gurmukhi: gur isK poh n hMGnI swDsMig auDwrw ]4]
lines.transliteration_english: Gur Sikh Poh N Hanghanee Saadhasangi Udhaaraa ?4?

Shabad OS B.translation: And lacs of attractive fruits and other temptations cannot even touch that Sikh of the Guru who has got liberated in the holy congregation.

lines.gurmukhi: 5 gurisK moh rihq hY

Shabad OS B.translation: Gursikh is devoid of infatuation

lines.gurmukhi: ipau puq mwvV DIvVI huie BYx iBrwvw
lines.transliteration_english: Piu Poutu Maavarh Dheearhee Hoi Bhain Bhiraavaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Father, son, mother, daughter, sister, brother are there.

lines.gurmukhi: nwir Bqwru ipAwr lK mn myl imlwvw
lines.transliteration_english: Naari Bhataaru Piaar Lakh Man Mayli Milaavaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Husband and wife love each other profusely with their hearts.

lines.gurmukhi: suMdr mMdr icqRswl bwg Pul suhwvw
lines.transliteration_english: Soundar Mandar Chitrasaal Baag Phul Suhaavaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Pleasure-giving beautiful palaces, art galleries, gardens and flowers are all delightful.

lines.gurmukhi: rwg rMg rs rUp lK bhu Bog Bulwvw
lines.transliteration_english: Raag Rang Ras Roop Lakh Bahu Bhog Bhulaavaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Lacs of sounds, colours, flowers and forms delude people in enjoyments.

lines.gurmukhi: lK mwieAw lK moih imil huie mudeI dwvw
lines.transliteration_english: Lakh Maaiaa Lakh Mohi Mili Hoi Mudaee Daavaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Getting engrossed in millions types of infatuations people have manyfold claims (over each other).

lines.gurmukhi: guru isK poih n hMGnI swDsMg suhwvw ]5]
lines.transliteration_english: Guru Sikh Pohi N Hanghanee Saadhasangu Suhaavaa ?5?

Shabad OS B.translation: To the Sikhs of the Guru, adorning the holy congregation, even all these cannot affect in any way.

lines.gurmukhi: 6 gurisK- KudI qoN KwlI hY

Shabad OS B.translation: The Sikh of the Guru is devoid of ego-

lines.gurmukhi: vrnwvrn n BwvnI kir KudI KhMdy
lines.transliteration_english: Varanaa Varan N Bhaavanee Kari Khudee Khahanday.

Shabad OS B.translation: All the vamas (castes) do not love one another and quarrel among themselves in ego;

lines.gurmukhi: jMgl AMdir sINh duie blvMq bukMdy
lines.transliteration_english: Jangal Andari Seenh Dui Balavanti Boukanday.

Shabad OS B.translation: If there are two lions in a jungle they roar mightily at each other.

lines.gurmukhi: hwQI hiQAweI krn mqvwly huie AVI AVMdy
lines.transliteration_english: Haadee Hadiaaee Karani Matavaalay Hui Arhee Arhanday.

Shabad OS B.translation: They all are like those intoxicated elephants which stubbornly fight each other.

lines.gurmukhi: rwj BUp rwjy vfy ml dys lVMdy
lines.transliteration_english: Raaj Bhoop Raajay Vaday Mal Days Larhanday.

Shabad OS B.translation: The mighty kings capture large territories and fight with each other.

lines.gurmukhi: mulk AMdr pwqswh duie jwie jMg juVMdy
lines.transliteration_english: Mulak Andari Paatisaah Dui Jaai Jang Jurhanday.

Shabad OS B.translation: Two emperors in a country will go at war with each another.

lines.gurmukhi: haumY kir hMkwr lK ml ml GulMdy
lines.transliteration_english: Haoumai Kari Hankaar Lakh Mal Mal Ghuladay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Guided and controlled by ego lacs of wrestlers wrestle with one another.

lines.gurmukhi: guru isK poih n sknI swDu sMig vsMdy ]6]
lines.transliteration_english: Guru Sikh Pohi N Sakanee Saadhu Sangi Vasanday ?6?

Shabad OS B.translation: But ego cannot touch the Sikhs of the Guru residing in the holy congregation.

lines.gurmukhi: 7 gurisK - inr hMkwr jqI hY

Shabad OS B.translation: The Sikh of the Guru is prideless -

lines.gurmukhi: gorK jqI sdwieMdw iqsu gur GrbwrI
lines.transliteration_english: Gorakh Jatee Sadaaindaa Tisu Guru Gharibaaree.

Shabad OS B.translation: Gorakh claimed to be a celebate but his teacher Machhandar (Matsyendr) lived like a virtual householder.

lines.gurmukhi: sukr kwxw hoieAw durmMqR vIcwrI
lines.transliteration_english: Soukar Kaanaa Hoiaa Mantee Avichaaree.

Shabad OS B.translation: Sukrachary too was stigmatised for his evil mantra.

lines.gurmukhi: lKmx swDI BuK qyh haumY AhMkwrI
lines.transliteration_english: Lakhaman Saadhee Bhoukh Tayh Haoumai Ahankaaree.

Shabad OS B.translation: Laksaman disciplined his hunger and thirst and was proud on this account.

lines.gurmukhi: hnUMmwn blvMq hoie cMcl miq KwrI
lines.transliteration_english: Hanoonmat Balavant Aakheeai Chanchal Mati Khaaree.

Shabad OS B.translation: Hanumán (monkey god) is known to be very powerful but his mind was quite volatile.

lines.gurmukhi: BYrau BUq kusUq sMig durmiq aurDwrI
lines.transliteration_english: Bhairau Bhoot Kasoot Sangi Duramati Uradhaaree.

Shabad OS B.translation: Bhairav also because of his association with evil spirits maintained his evilmindedness.

lines.gurmukhi: gurisK jqI slwhIAin ijin haumY mwrI ]7]
lines.transliteration_english: Gurasikh Jatee Salaaheeani Jini Haoumai Maaree ?7?

Shabad OS B.translation: Sikhs of the Guru who have effaced their ego are praised as (really) virtuous persons.

lines.gurmukhi: 8 gurisK - sqI

Shabad OS B.translation: The Sikh of the Guru is the follower of truth -

lines.gurmukhi: hrI cMd siq riKAw jwie inKws ivkwxw
lines.transliteration_english: Haree Chand Sati Rakhiaa Jaai Nikhaas Vikaanaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Harischandr abided by truth and got himself sold in the market place.

lines.gurmukhi: bl CilAw sq pwldw pwqwil isDwxw
lines.transliteration_english: Bal Chhaliaa Satu Paaladaa Paataali Sidhaanaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Though duped (by Visnu), King Bali observed truth and went to the netherworld.

lines.gurmukhi: krnu su kMcn dwn kir AMqu pCoqwxw
lines.transliteration_english: Karanu Su Kanchan Daan Kari Antu Pachhotaanaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Karn would also give gold in charity but he had to repent ultimately (because god Indr demanded his armour ana earrings of him which he readily gave and lost his powers).

lines.gurmukhi: siqvwdI huie Drm puqu kUV jmpuir jwxw
lines.transliteration_english: Sativaadee Hui Dharamapoutu Koorh Jamapuri Jaanaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: The truthful Yudhisthar, son of Yama, for his one lie had to go to hell.

lines.gurmukhi: jqI sqI sMqoKIAw haumY grbwxw
lines.transliteration_english: Jatee Satee Santokheeaa Haoumai Garabaanaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many celebates, truthful and contented people have flourished but they all were proud of their conduct.

lines.gurmukhi: gurisK rom n pujnI bhu mwx inmwxw ]8]
lines.transliteration_english: Gurasikh Rom N Pujanee Bahu Maan Nimaanaa ?8?

Shabad OS B.translation: Such a humble one is the Sikh of the Guru that all these are not equal to his one trichome.

lines.gurmukhi: 9 gurisK - ihMdU muslmwn qoN au`cw hY

Shabad OS B.translation: Gursikh is above the feelings of Hindu and Muslim -

lines.gurmukhi: muslmwxwN ihMdUAwN duie rwh clwey
lines.transliteration_english: Mousalamaanaa Hindooaan Dui Raah Chalaaay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Hindus and Muslims have started two separate ways (of life).

lines.gurmukhi: mjhb vrn gxwieNdy guru pIru sdwey
lines.transliteration_english: Majahab Varan Ganaainday Guru Peeru Sadaaay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Muslims count their mazahabs (sects) and Hindus count their varnas (castes) and call themselves pirs and gurus respectively.

lines.gurmukhi: isK murId pKMf kir aupdys diRVwey
lines.transliteration_english: Sikh Mureed Pakhand Kari Oupadays Drirhaaay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Through pretension and hypocrisy they make people their followers (Sikhs and murtils) whom they give instruction.

lines.gurmukhi: rwm rhIm iDAwieNdy haumY grbwey
lines.transliteration_english: Raam Raheem Dhiaainday Haoumai Garabaaay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Adoring Ram and and Rahtm they remain conceited in their sense of ego.

lines.gurmukhi: mkw gMg bnwrsI pUj jwrq Awey
lines.transliteration_english: Makaa Gang Banaarasee Pooj Jaarat Aaay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Separately, they go for pilgrimage and worship to Mecca, Ganges and Banaras.

lines.gurmukhi: rojy vrq nmwz kir fMfauq krwey
lines.transliteration_english: Rojay Varat Namaaj Kari Dandaouti Karaaay.

Shabad OS B.translation: They observe rozas, vrats (fasts), namaz and prostration (Muslim and Hindu way of worship).

lines.gurmukhi: guru isK rom n pujnI jo Awpu gvwey ]9]
lines.transliteration_english: Guru Sikh Rom N Pujanee Jo Aapu Gavaaay ?9?

Shabad OS B.translation: They all are not equal to even one trichome of a Gum's Sikh who has effaced his sense of ego.

lines.gurmukhi: 10 gurisK ihMdI mq mqwNqRwN qoN au`cw

Shabad OS B.translation: Gursikh is above all religions and sects

lines.gurmukhi: iCA drsn vrqwieAw caudh Knvwdy
lines.transliteration_english: Chhia Darasan Varataaiaa Chaudah Khanavaaday.

Shabad OS B.translation: There are six schools of philosophy and fourteen lineages (of the Sufis).

lines.gurmukhi: GrY GuMim GrbwrIAw Asvwr ipAwdy
lines.transliteration_english: Gharai Ghoonmi Gharabaareeaa Asavaar Piaaday.

Shabad OS B.translation: Householders, riders and foot soldiers move about in circles in the world.

lines.gurmukhi: sMinAwsI ds nwm Dir kir vwd kvwdy
lines.transliteration_english: Sanniaasee Das Naam Dhari Kari Vaad Kavaaday.

Shabad OS B.translation: Maintaining ten names, the sanyasi sects go on debating among themselves.

lines.gurmukhi: rwvl bwrh pMQ kir iPrdy audmwdy
lines.transliteration_english: Raaval Baarah Pand Kari Dhiraday Udamaaday.

Shabad OS B.translation: Ravals, the yogis, also split in twelve sects and roam mad with pride.

lines.gurmukhi: jYnI jUT n auqrY jUTy prswdy
lines.transliteration_english: Jainee Jootd N Outarai Jootday Parasaaday.

Shabad OS B.translation: Leftover is grace for Jains and their contamination is never removed.

lines.gurmukhi: guru isK rom n pujnI Duir Awid jugwdy ]10]
lines.transliteration_english: Guru Sikh Rom N Pujanee Dhuri Aadi Jougaaday ?10?

Shabad OS B.translation: They all are not equal to one trichome of that Gursikh who has attuned himself with that great primeval Lord.

lines.gurmukhi: 11 gur isK AMnRX dySI qy AMnRX DrmIAwN qoN aucw hY

Shabad OS B.translation: Gursikh is above other indigenous and foreign religions

lines.gurmukhi: bhu suMnI sIA rwPjI mjhb mn Bwxy
lines.transliteration_english: Bahu Sounnee Seea Raadhasee Majahab Mani Bhaanay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many people are there of attractive sects of Sunnis, Sias and Rafazts.

lines.gurmukhi: mulihd hoie munwPkw sB Brim Bulwxy
lines.transliteration_english: Mulahid Hoi Mounaadhakaa Sabh Bharami Bhulaanay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many hypocrites becoming atheists and deluded by illusions go on wandering here and there.

lines.gurmukhi: eIsweI mUsweIAwN haumY hYrwxy
lines.transliteration_english: Eesaaee Moosaaeeaan Haoumai Hairaanay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Followers of Jesus and Moses are also many who are confounded in their own pride.

lines.gurmukhi: hoie iPrMgI ArmnI rUmI grbwxy
lines.transliteration_english: Hoi Dhirangee Aramanee Roomee Garabaanay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Some are blackclad recluses and dervishes wearing bunches of cowaries

lines.gurmukhi: kwlI pos klMdrw drvys dugwxy
lines.transliteration_english: Kaalee Pos Kaladaraan Daravays Dougaanay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Around their arms who move about here and there.

lines.gurmukhi: guru isK rom n pujnI gur hit ivkwxy ]11]
lines.transliteration_english: Guru Sikh Rom N Pujanee Gur Hati Vikaanay ?11?

Shabad OS B.translation: They all are not equal to even a trichome of those Gursikhs who have sold themselves at the hands of the Guru.

lines.gurmukhi: 12 gur isK krm Drm qoN au`cw suKPl ivc hY

Shabad OS B.translation: Gursikh is above ritualism and lives in the pleasure-fruit

lines.gurmukhi: jp qp sMjm swDnw hT ingH krxy
lines.transliteration_english: Jap Tap Sanjam Saadhanaa Hatd Nigrah Karanay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Actions such as recitations, austerities, continence, devotion, perseverence, control over senses, etc. are performed.

lines.gurmukhi: vrq nym qIrQ Gxy AiDAwqm Drxy
lines.transliteration_english: Varat Naym Teerad Ghanay Adhiaatam Dharanay.

Shabad OS B.translation: For spirituality, fasts, observances, pilgrimages are undertaken.

lines.gurmukhi: dyvI dyvw dyhury pUjw prvrxy
lines.transliteration_english: Dayvee Dayvaa Dayhuray Poojaa Paravaranay.

Shabad OS B.translation: One gets inclined towards temples for the worship of gods and goddesses.

lines.gurmukhi: hom jg bhu dwn kir muK vyd aucrxy
lines.transliteration_english: Hom Jag Bahu Daan Kari Moukh Vayd Oucharanay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Besides burnt offerings and charities of many kinds, Vedic hymns are chanted.

lines.gurmukhi: krm Drm BY Brm ivic bhu jMmx mrxy
lines.transliteration_english: Karam Dharam Bhai Bharam Vichi Bahu Janman Maranay.

Shabad OS B.translation: Getting stuck in such religious, ritualistic illusions, fear and doubt only leads to transmigration.

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuiK suK Pl swDsMig imil duqru qrxy ]12]
lines.transliteration_english: Guramoukhi Soukh Phal Saadhasangi Mili Douturu Taranay ?12?

Shabad OS B.translation: The pleasure fruit of gurmukhs is the holy congregation meeting which the ardous world-ocean is crossed.

lines.gurmukhi: audy Asiq ivic rwj kir ckÍriq Gnyry
lines.transliteration_english: Uday Asati Vichi Raaj Kari Chakravarati Ghanayray.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many such kings are there whose kingdom extends from the point of sunrise to the point of sunset.

lines.gurmukhi: Arb Krb lY drb iniD rs Boig cMgyry
lines.transliteration_english: Arab Kharab Lai Darab Nidhi Ras Bhogi Changayray.

Shabad OS B.translation: They have wealth worth billions and choice luxuries to enjoy.

lines.gurmukhi: nrpiq surpiq CqRpiq haumY ivic Gyry
lines.transliteration_english: Narapati Surapati Chhatrapati Haoumai Vichi Ghayray.

Shabad OS B.translation: All these kings of mortals and gods are engrossed in their ego.

lines.gurmukhi: isv lokhuN cViH bHm lok bYkuMT vsyry
lines.transliteration_english: Siv Lokahu Charhhi Braham Lok Baikountd Vasayray.

Shabad OS B.translation: Rising from the abode of Siva they attain the abode of Brahma and Vaikunth, the heavens;

lines.gurmukhi: icr jIvxu bhu hMFxw hoih vfy vfyry
lines.transliteration_english: Chir Jeevanu Bahu Handdhanaa Hohi Vaday Vadayray.

Shabad OS B.translation: Many other long-lived have also flourished,

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuiK suK Pl Agmu hY huie Bly Blyry ]13]
lines.transliteration_english: Guramoukhi Soukh Phalu Agamu Hai Hoi Bhalay Bhalayray ?13?

Shabad OS B.translation: But the pleasure fruit of gurmukhs is unapproachable and better than the best one.

lines.gurmukhi: 14 gurisK ieMdRX suKwN qoN au`cy suK Pl ivc hY

Shabad OS B.translation: Gursikh's pleasure fruit transcends sensual pleasures

lines.gurmukhi: rUp AnUp srUp lK huie rMg ibrMgI
lines.transliteration_english: Roopu Anoop Saroop Lakh Hoi Rang Birangee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Millions of variegated creatures of unparallel beauty are there in this world.

lines.gurmukhi: rwg nwd sMbwd lK sMgiq ABMgI
lines.transliteration_english: Raag Naad Sanbaad Lakh Sangeet Abhangee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Likewise millions of vibrations, dialogues and their constant music is there.

lines.gurmukhi: gMD sugMiD imlwp lK Argjy AdMgI
lines.transliteration_english: Gandh Sougandhi Milaap Lakh Aragajay Adangee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Mixing many scents millions of pure essences are prepared.

lines.gurmukhi: CqIh Bojn pwkswl rs Bog suFMgI
lines.transliteration_english: Chhateeh Bhojan Paakasaal Ras Bhog Suddhangee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Similarly in cook houses thirtysix types of delicious dishes are there.

lines.gurmukhi: pwt ptMbr gihixAwN sohihN srbMgI
lines.transliteration_english: Paat Patanbar Gahaniaan Sohahi Sarabangee.

Shabad OS B.translation: The fully grown up women are there decorated with silken robes and ornaments.

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuiK suK Pl Agm hY guruisK shlMgI ]14]
lines.transliteration_english: Guramoukhi Soukh Phalu Aganmu Hai Gurousikh Sahalagee ?14?

Shabad OS B.translation: But association with the gurmukhs is a pleasure fruit which is unapproachable.

lines.gurmukhi: 15 gurisK mn bu`DI dy suKwN qoN au`cy suK ivc hY

Shabad OS B.translation: Gursikh enjoys the delight higher than the pleasures of mind and intellect)

lines.gurmukhi: lK miq buiD suiD aukiq lK lK lK cqurweI
lines.transliteration_english: Lakh Mati Budhi Sudhi Oukati Lakh Lakh Lakh Chaturaaee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Plenty of practical arts, spiritual wisdom, wise sayings and skills are extent (upto day).

lines.gurmukhi: lK bl bcn ibbyk lK prikriq kmweI
lines.transliteration_english: Lakh Bal Bachan Bibayk Lakh Parakirati Kamaaee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Lacs of powers, discretions, discourses and physical services are known.

lines.gurmukhi: lK isAwxp suriq lK lK suriq GVweI
lines.transliteration_english: Lakh Siaanap Surati Lakh Lakh Surati Sougharhaaee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Plenty of cleverness, consciousness and knowledge of skills are available.

lines.gurmukhi: igAwn iDAwn ismrx shMs lK piq vifAweI
lines.transliteration_english: Giaan Dhiaan Simarani Sahans Lakh Pati Vadiaaee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Similarly knowledges, meditations, remembrances and eulogies are there in thousands.

lines.gurmukhi: haumY AMdir vrqxw dir Qwie n pweI
lines.transliteration_english: Haoumai Andari Varatanaa Dari Daai N Paaee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Having all this and behaving in arrogant manner, one does not get place at the door of the Lord.

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuiK suK Pl Agm hY siqgur srxweI ]15]
lines.transliteration_english: Guramoukhi Soukh Phal Agam Hai Satigur Saranaaee ?15?

Shabad OS B.translation: The pleasure fruit of gurmukh's coming in the shelter of Guru is unapproachable.

lines.gurmukhi: 16 gurisK sqoguxI suKwN qoN aucw iprm rs ivc hY

Shabad OS B.translation: Gursikh transcending pure pleasures remains in the delight of love

lines.gurmukhi: siq sMqoK dieAw Drmu lK ArQ imlwhI
lines.transliteration_english: Sati Santokh Daiaa Dharamu Lakh Arad Milaahee.

Shabad OS B.translation: If truth, contentment, compassion, dharma and wealth worth lacs are combined;

lines.gurmukhi: Driq Agws pwxI pvx lK qyj qpwhI
lines.transliteration_english: Dharati Agaas Paanee Pavan Lakh Tayj Tapaahee.

Shabad OS B.translation: If earth, sky, water, air and immensely bright heat are there;

lines.gurmukhi: iKmwN DIrj lK lK imil soBw srmwhI
lines.transliteration_english: Khimaan Dheeraj Lakh Laji Mili Sobhaa Saramaahee.

Shabad OS B.translation: If the combination of forgiveness, patience and myriad modesties put grandeur to shame;

lines.gurmukhi: swNiq shj suK sukiRqw Bwau Bgiq krwhI
lines.transliteration_english: Saanti Sahaj Soukh Soukritaa Bhaau Bhagatee Karaahee.

Shabad OS B.translation: If peace, equipoise, good actions motivate for the loving devotion;

lines.gurmukhi: sgl pdwrQ sgl Pl AwnMd vDwhI
lines.transliteration_english: Sagal Padaarad Sagal Phal Aanad Vadhaahee.

Shabad OS B.translation: And if they all join to increase the delight further, even then they cannot approach

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuiK suK Pl iprm rs iek iqlu n pujwhI ]16]
lines.transliteration_english: Guramoukhi Soukh Phal Pirami Rasu Iku Tilu N Pujaahee ?16?

Shabad OS B.translation: An iota of the pleasure fruit in the form of loving devotional sentiment of the gurmukhs.

lines.gurmukhi: 17 guris`K Awqmw suKwN qoN au`cw iprm rs ivc hY

Shabad OS B.translation: Gursikh lives in the sentiment of love above all the spiritual pleasures

lines.gurmukhi: lK lK jog iDAwn imil Dir iDAwnu bhMdy
lines.transliteration_english: Lakh Lakh Jog Dhiaan Mili Dhari Dhiaanu Bahanday.

Shabad OS B.translation: If lacs of yogis sit in meditation jointly;

lines.gurmukhi: lK lK suMn smwiD swiD inj Awsx sMdy
lines.transliteration_english: Lakh Lakh Sounn Samaadhi Saadhi Nij Aasan Sanday.

Shabad OS B.translation: If lacs of sadhus in meditation of postures go into tranquil trances;

lines.gurmukhi: lK syK ismrx krihN gux igAwn gxMdy
lines.transliteration_english: Lakh Saykh Simarani Karahi Goun Giaan Gananday.

Shabad OS B.translation: If lacs of Sesanags keep remembering and eulogizing the Lord;

lines.gurmukhi: mihmwN lK mhwqmwN jYkwr krMdy
lines.transliteration_english: Mahimaan Lakh Mahaatamaan Jaikaar Karanday.

Shabad OS B.translation: If lacs of great souls cheerfully applaud Him;

lines.gurmukhi: ausqiq aupmwN lK lK lK Bgq jpMdy
lines.transliteration_english: Ousatati Oupamaan Lakh Lakh Lakh Bhagati Japanday.

Shabad OS B.translation: If lacs of devotees eulogize His glories and perform lacs of recitations of His name,

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuiK suK Pl iprm rs iek pl n lhMdy ]17]
lines.transliteration_english: Guramoukhi Soukh Phalu Piram Rasu Ik Palu N Lahanday ?17?

Shabad OS B.translation: Even then they all cannot withstand the one moment of loving delight of a gurmukh.

lines.gurmukhi: 18 gurisK iprm ros ivsmwd qoN au`cw hY vwh vwh

Shabad OS B.translation: The loving delight of gurmukh is above all wonders

lines.gurmukhi: Acrj no Awcrju hY Acrju hovMdw
lines.transliteration_english: Acharaj No Aacharaju Hai Acharaju Hovandaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Even the most wonderful wonder becomes full of wonder in the presence of loving delight.

lines.gurmukhi: ivsmwdy ivsmwdu hY ivsmwdu rhMdw
lines.transliteration_english: Visamaadai Visamaadu Hai Visamaadu Rahandaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Before love, awe also feels itself full of awe.

lines.gurmukhi: hYrwxy hYrwxu hY hYrwxu krMdw
lines.transliteration_english: Hairaanai Hairaanu Hai Hairaanu Karandaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Love makes even the surprise full of surprise.

lines.gurmukhi: AibgqhuN Aibgqu hY nihN AlKu lKMdw
lines.transliteration_english: Abigatahu Abigatu Hai Nahi Alakhu Lakhandaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Unmanifest to unmanifestation, that unperceptible Lord cannot be perceived.

lines.gurmukhi: AkQhuN AkQ AlyK hY nyiq nyiq suxMdw
lines.transliteration_english: Akadahu Akad Alaykhu Hai Nayti Nayti Sounandaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: He is beyond all descriptions and is known as neti neti, this is not, this is not.

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuK suK Pl iprm rs vwhu vwhu cvMdw ]18]
lines.transliteration_english: Guramoukhi Soukh Phalu Piram Rasu Vaahu Vaahu Chavandaa ?18?

Shabad OS B.translation: The pleasure fruit of gurmukhs is delight of love which causes him to say wondrous, wonderful!

lines.gurmukhi: 19 iprm rs pRwpqI dw vsIlw-gurU, siqsMg, nwm, haUmy qXwg

Shabad OS B.translation: Guru, holy congregation, nam and shedding of ego are the means for the attainment of the loving delight)    -, , ,

lines.gurmukhi: iek kvwau pswau kir bHmMf pswry
lines.transliteration_english: Iku Kavaau Pasaau Kari Brahamand Pasaaray.

Shabad OS B.translation: The Lord spreading His one vibration, created all the universes.

lines.gurmukhi: kir bHmMf kroV lK rom rom sMjwry
lines.transliteration_english: Kari Brahamand Karorh Lakh Rom Rom Sanjaaray.

Shabad OS B.translation: Having created lacs and crores of universes He subsumes them in His each trichome.

lines.gurmukhi: pwrbHm pUrx bHm guru rUpu murwry
lines.transliteration_english: Paarabraham Pooran Braham Guru Roopu Muraaray.

Shabad OS B.translation: That Murdri; killer of Mur demon, the transcendent Brahm is the perfect Guru Brahm.

lines.gurmukhi: guru cylw cylw gurU gur sbd vIcwry
lines.transliteration_english: Guru Chaylaa Chaylaa Guroo Gur Sabadu Veechaaray.

Shabad OS B.translation: Under His influence the Guru becoming disciple and the disciple becoming Guru, they ponder upon the word of the Guru, i.e. the Guru and the disciple have subsumed in each other.

lines.gurmukhi: swDsMgiq sc KMf hY vwsw inrMkwry
lines.transliteration_english: Saadhasangati Sachu Khand Hai Vaasaa Nirankaaray.

Shabad OS B.translation: Holy congregation is the abode of truth wherein resides the word of the formless One.

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuiK suK Pl iprm rs dyih haumY mwry ]19]
lines.transliteration_english: Guramoukhi Soukh Phalu Piram Rasu Day Haoumai Maaray ?19?

Shabad OS B.translation: Bestowing loving delight on the gurmukhs, this holy congregation wipes out their ego.

lines.gurmukhi: 20 Kt gur ausqiq

Shabad OS B.translation: Praises of the six Gurus

lines.gurmukhi: siqgur nwnk dyau hY prmysur soeI
lines.transliteration_english: Satiguru Naanak Dayu Hai Paramaysaru Soee.

Shabad OS B.translation: Guru Nanak is the true Guru and is God Himself.

lines.gurmukhi: guru AMgdu guru AMg qy joqI joiq smoeI
lines.transliteration_english: Guru Angadu Guru Ang Tay Jotee Joti Samoee.

Shabad OS B.translation: From the limb of this Guru was created Guru Angad and his flame merged in his (Guru Angad' s ) flame.

lines.gurmukhi: Amrwpd guru AMgdhuN huie jwxu jxoeI
lines.transliteration_english: Amaraapadu Guru Angadahu Hui Jaanu Janoee.

Shabad OS B.translation: From Guru Angad the omniscient Guru Amar Das emerged who was given the status of Guru.

lines.gurmukhi: guru AmrhuN gurU rwmdws AMmiRq rsu BoeI
lines.transliteration_english: Guru Amarahu Guroo Raamadaas Anmrit Rasu Bhoee.

Shabad OS B.translation: From Amar Das came into being Guru Ram Das who was quaffer of the nectar.

lines.gurmukhi: rwmdwshuN Arjn gurU guru sbd sQoeI
lines.transliteration_english: Raamadaasahu Arajanu Guroo Guru Sabad Sadoee.

Shabad OS B.translation: From Ram Das came Guru Arjan Dev, the companion of the Guru's word.

lines.gurmukhi: hirgoivMd guru ArjnhuN guru goivMd hoeI
lines.transliteration_english: Harigovind Guru Arajanahu Guru Govindu Hoee.

Shabad OS B.translation: From Guru Arjan emerged Guru Hargobind, Guru and God in one.

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuK suK Pl iprm rs siqsMg AloeI
lines.transliteration_english: Guramoukhi Soukh Phal Piram Rasu Satisang Aloee.

Shabad OS B.translation: The gurmukhs in the holy congregation came face to face of the pleasure fruit of loving delight.

lines.gurmukhi: guru goivMdhuN bwihrw dUjw nhIN koeI ]20]38]
lines.transliteration_english: Guru Govindahu Baahiraa Doojaa Nahee Koee ?20?38?atdateeha?

Shabad OS B.translation: Nothing in this world is outside the Guru and God.

lines.gurmukhi: <> siqgur pRswid ]
lines.transliteration_english: Ikonkaar Satigur Prasaadi ?

Shabad OS B.translation: One Oankar, the primal energy, realized through the grace of divine preceptor

lines.gurmukhi: pUrn bHm gur ibrK ibQwr Dwr mun kMd swKw pqR Aink pRkwr hY
lines.transliteration_english: Pooran Braham Gur Birakh Bidaar Dhaara , Moun Kand Saakhaa Patr Anik Prakaar Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Satguru, a total form of complete Lord is like a fragrant tree, whose spread has many branches, leaves, flowers in the form of Sikhs.

lines.gurmukhi: qw mY inj rUp gurisK Pl ko pRgws bwsnw subws Aau sÍwd aupkwr hY
lines.transliteration_english: Taa Mai Nij Roop Gursikh Dhal Ko Pragaasa , Baasanaa Soubaas Au Svaad Oupakaar Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: By the strenuous toil of devoted Sikhs like Bhai Lehna Ji and Baba Amar Das Ji, the True Guru illuminated His own light in them. Engulfed in the desire of worship and fragrance of the Lord, these pious souls are keen to spread and distribute the elixir-li

lines.gurmukhi: crn kml mkrMd rs risk huie cwKy crnwmiRq sMswr ko auDwr hY
lines.transliteration_english: Charan Kamal Makarand Ras Rasik Hui , Chaakhay Charanaamrit Sansaar Ko Udhaar Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Such Gursikhs enjoying the fragrance of the dust of Lord's lotus-feet emancipate others from the world.

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuiK mwrg mhwqm AkQ kQw nyiq nyiq nyiq nmo nmo nmskwr hY ]38]
lines.transliteration_english: Gurmukhi Maarag Mahaatam Akad Kadaa , Nayti Nayti Nayti Namo Namo Namasakaar Hai ?38?

Shabad OS B.translation: The glory of the path of Sikhism cannot be described. All that we can say is that He is infinite, infinite and beyond and is worthy of our salutes myriad times. (38)
